ing: 6 leaves fresh basil, cut into strips
salt and cracked black pepper to taste
des: "This salad has started so many of my meals and has never failed to impress. One downside - you're going to have to keep making it for insatiable guests! Serve with a toasted and buttered english muffin for guests writhing with pleasure!"
ins: Combine tomatoes, mozzarella, avocado, basil, and corn in a bowl. Add olive oil, truffle oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and black pepper. Toss gently to incorporate all ingredients.
